programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Sanggang
programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.title: Beauty Empire
programme.desc: is a glossy drama series about a rags-to-riches beauty entrepreneur who is out to take revenge on the people who have wronged her. She comes out as a new beauty industry player, tearing down the empire that her enemies have built. She goes head-to-head against a crass but social media famous beauty CEO who is mentored by her idol, a powerful industry veteran whose ties to her goes beyond business.

programme.title: Saksi
programme.desc: Brings up-to-the-minute news, relentlessly delivering breaking stories and covering live reports.

programme.title: Unang Hirit
programme.desc: A news magazine show that offers humor and information from hard news to special interests segments on travel, health, housekeeping and entertainment.

programme.title: Wish Ko Lang
programme.desc: The first wish-granting program on Philippine television, featuring inspiring stories of ordinary Filipinos as they struggle to overcome extraordinary situations.

programme.title: Born To Be Wild
programme.desc: Adventures that explore the unknown and take viewers to an amazing wildlife encounter.

programme.title: Daig Kayo Ng Lola Ko
programme.desc: About a stereotypical grandmother who is kind, loving and attentive. Unknown to many, she is benevolent keeper of an extraordinary and mystical family secret.

programme.title: Cruz Vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: My Father's Wife
programme.desc: Two friends, Gina and Betsy, strike a deal: Gina will enter into a marriage of convenience with Betsy's boyfriend, Gerald, to help Betsy achieve her American dream. But when Gina and Gerald unexpectedly fall in love and choose to honor their vows, everything changes. Betrayed and furious, Betsy retaliates in the most shocking way-by marrying Gina's father. What begins as a calculated plan spirals

programme.title: Akusada
programme.desc: Is the story of Carolina Astor, a resort staff who accidentally kills Joi, a resort shareholder. Carolina goes into hiding and assumes a new identity - Lorena. Lorena moves on and starts a new life but her past will haunt her.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Ang Mamatay Nang Dahil Sa Iyo
programme.desc: Anthony Alonzo characterizes a patriotic soldier whose amor patria runs curdling in his veins. His ideologies led him to a clash of opinions with his younger brother.

programme.title: Alabang Girls (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Alabang, an upscale suburb on the South of Manila, was the setting for this wacky tale of boys from the wrong side of the tracks, who easily fall for rich and pretty girls, who lived in Alabang.

programme.title: Pipti-Pipti (1 Por U, 2 Por Me)
programme.desc: Jack and Popoy were escaped convicts on the trail of twenty million pesos. Others were also in search of the money but the duo were lucky enough to elude them and discovered the loot buried in some remote town.

programme.title: The Maggie Dela Riva Story
programme.desc: Maggie Dela Riva was a popular young actress in 1969 when she was abducted and raped by four men from rich, influential families. Concerned about the rising number of crimes against women, Maggie came out of retirement to once more tell her story.

programme.title: Bakit Ikaw Pa Rin?
programme.desc: Paul and Jenny eloped at the tender age of 17 and managed to triumph over their difficulties. Things eventually takes its toll as Paul's sister, Sylvia schemes to separate them.

programme.title: Gising Na Ang Higanteng Natutulog
programme.desc: Sgt. Delfin Guerrero (Andy Poe), an honest, kind-hearted and dedicated motorcycle cop who took on corrupt politicians in his mission to uphold the law.

programme.title: Diego
programme.desc: He is a member of an elite crop in the military. However,when his group decided to stage a coup against the government,he defied his head. What danger lurks in the jungle makes Diego a stark study of human fortitude and courage?

programme.title: Pacifico Guevarra, Dillinger Ng Pares
programme.desc: Young action star Raymart Santiago played one of his most demanding roles as Pacifico Guevarra who called himself Dillinger after the American gangster whom he idolized.

programme.title: Silaw
programme.desc: Six unsuspecting teens are camping on the site of Mt. Lihim ng Aguila when they trip into a missile silo controlled by a discharged ex-general. Will the teens be able to sneak out of the mess alive, or will they be forever trapped?

programme.title: Anghel Na Walang Langit
programme.desc: Vina Morales played two very demanding roles. Two women unrelated and who have never met, but looking very much alike, found their lives entertained when the people close to them mistook them for one another.

programme.title: Brown Ninja
programme.desc: Jun (Dante Varona) barely survives a massacre that wipes out his whole family. He was found by a blind, old man in the woods and is nursed back to health. The old man also teaches him the secrets of being a ninja. Jun makes use of his new skills to find his family's killers and bring them to justice.

programme.title: Miguelito (Batang Rebelde)
programme.desc: Mayor Ven Herera (Eddie Garcia) is grooming his only son Miguelito \"Mike\" Herera (Aga Mulach) to be his predecessor. Mike, however, has other plans and live a happy go lucky life.

programme.title: Send In The Clowns
programme.desc: Tito, Vic and Joey play the brothers Roberto, Icardo, and Rodrigo. Tired of getting fired from different odd jobs, they decide to make use of their ability to make people laugh by working as clowns in a carnival.

programme.title: Hindi Pa Tapos Ang Laban
programme.desc: In a world where the most corrupt are the most powerful, is there a room a good mans quest for justice to succeed? The undisputed King of Action takes on the role of a modern day crusader in this exciting, action packed movie that pits the powers of goodness against the forces of evil.

programme.title: Isang Tanong, Isang Sagot
programme.desc: Jason played the role of a rich and bratty student who fell in love with one of his maids, played by the lovely Donna Cruz. Surprised at the turn of events, he tried to hide his feelings by being unkind to the girl.

programme.title: Si Mokong, Si Astig At Si Gamol
programme.desc: Mokong and Astig were former street kids who now had wards of their own. They used their wits to support them with all types of scam.

programme.title: Bakit Bughaw Ang Langit?
programme.desc: Why is the sky blue? Why do we love the people we love? These are questions no one can answer. Because is just is.

programme.title: Lagablab Sa Paraiso
programme.desc: A nurse and her cousin, a nightclub dancer, a honeymooning couple and two male prisoners. Survivors of a shipwreck, they are trapped together in an island. Of different backgrounds and personalities, can they set aside their differences to survive roughing it up in this island?

programme.title: Ang Pumatay Ng Dahil Sa'yo
programme.desc: Sergeant Emilio Sanchez is a dedicated military man. He believes that Filipinos should stand on their own and not be taken by the Americans.

programme.title: Lihim
programme.desc: Bianca and her friends sailed off to the pristine and beautiful Palawan for a few days of fun. Living in the city had made them hungry for the isolation an island resort offers. But then, tragedy struck just when they were starting to have fun.

programme.title: Row 4, The Baliktorians
programme.desc: Aruy (Dennis Padilla) and Aguy (Andrew E), heirs to a 10 million fortune, on a condition that they'll able to graduate. If not, the money would go to the school with so much at stake.

programme.title: Proboys
programme.desc: This is the story of five young women, their adventures and misadventures in their search for Mr. Right.

programme.title: Papunta Ka Pa Lang, Pabalik Na Ako
programme.desc: Gaston, a veteran police officer does not want Jojo, a rookie police asset, for his daughter. Jojo proves himself and he finds a sidekick in Jojo.

programme.title: Eagle Squad (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Eight young men of different convictions, lifestyles and outlook in life banded together to become the Eagle Squad, an elite group of secret marshalls formed to counteract criminal elements in the city.
